replies.body:
yeah, you're a great contributor to society making up shit about people you don't even know on the internet or in real life. 

time well-spent mate.  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
LoL Wat?  I bet I have a better job & earn more money than you do, which is how I afford to make my costumes.

> [{quoted}](name=PuShPoP,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=khKntIOi,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-06-27T10:22:10.633+0000)
>
> LoL Wat?  I bet I have a better job & earn more money than you do, which is how I afford to make my costumes.

I agree. All the cosplayers I know, work and some have an extra job on the side just to pay for their costumes. This guys can't spell and is just a troll or seriously one sad little person who doesn't know how to have fun.
I sense a giant tool inside this keyboard warrior
Commas, please. That will be all.
Have the winners been announced yet?{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Great to see some LoL love for Australian conventions! Who are the cosplayers in the pictures though? I can't see any credits :/ I'd love to be able to check out some of their other costumes.

Great point, I am a bad internet citizen. D:

All of the cosplayers were winners of last year's OPL Finals and you can check out photos of them [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/media/art/opl-cosplay-gallery). The guys we specifically used in this art here, though, are as below (and you can find them all on Facebook)!

Darius - Azra Onyx
Udyr - Misanthropic Cosplay
Blackfrost Anivia - PikaPi
Headhunter Caitlyn - Keik Cake Store
Nami - Scarlet Moth Cosplay
Order of the Lotus Irelia - Skyhuntress
Graves - Nguran Cosplay
The only one I know is the centre one - she's a good friend of mine! Her page is PikaPi https://www.facebook.com/pikapiart/
Will there be PAX limited skins on LEAGUES to purchase??1
its very unlikely as most of the PAX skins were stated to be obtainable only at the time of release.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Can someone under the age of 18 enter with parental consent? I'm just shy of 18 and I still would really love to enter and win a badge.[](https://www.facebook.com/Maxicosplay/photos/a.1426662154326602.1073741825.1426661414326676/1559821164344033/?type=1&theater)
It says in the offical rules that you must be 18yo as of October 2nd, so I assume if you will be 18 by then it will be fine to enter.
